data.actual_result: The mouse cursor changes to a closed hand with extended finger as though you were hovering over a hyperlink but moving further away from the backup code takes it back to a regular pointer
data.expected_result: The cursor should change from a text selection cursor to the regular mouse pointer
data.short_description: When hovering mouse over 2FA backup codes the cursor changes from a text selection to the hyperlink hand
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your User Settings - Have 2FA enabled - Click "View Backup Codes" & enter your password - Move the mouse over a backup code & move the mouse slowly to just below a code
